LCAParse
========

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   
   installation
   running

LCAParse is a tool for carrying out taxonomy assignment using a Lowest Common Ancestor algorithm. It currently supports BlastTab and minimap2 PAF files.

Further information
===================
* To find out how to download and install LCAParse, see the :ref:`Download and installation page <installation>`.
* To find out how to run LCAParse, see the :ref:`Running LCAParse page <running>`.
* Source code for LCAParse is on GitHub at `https://github.com/richardmleggett/LCAParse <https://github.com/richardmleggett/LCAParse>`_.
